name: PUGB - Battlegrounds
description:
When aliens came to earth they recognized cats as the superior species and gave them technology to take control. The humans could do nothing, but one brave pug stands up against cat tyrrany!

This game was made for GameDev.tv's 2022 gamejam where the theme was "Death is only the beginning!". My first thought was about old arcade games where a single run wasn't enough, you had to constantly die to improve and rise in the leaderboards. The second thing that came to mind was a old cartoon about a group of morons building crazy flying machines in order to catch a messenger pigeon, I combined those two aspects in the game. The cartoons name was "Dastardly And Muttley In Their Flying Machines"
